name: True Idle Simulator
description:
Tired of all those idle simulators requiring you to click things or build autoclikers?
Well, fear no more, this True Idle Simulator will solve all of those problems.
It doesn't require you to click, spend money or do absolutely anything at all!
Actually, it is so good at making you do nothing that it shouldn't even be called a simulator!
It is truly idle hence the name, the only question is: Do you have the patience to be the best?
